content:
Kathrine:Hey Mage wake up its time for your Escort she shakes him awake up i said Ah you are Finally Awake now come with us she thinks to herself he looks strangely Familiar to the mage who saved my Brother
Anna:Hey Kathrine no need to be that Harsh hey Alexander is your Name come i help you get up she offers him her Hand with a warm smile
